languages.text: "Прискорбно мало, {name}. Комморра — город {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, огромный домен ксеносов, возведенный прямо в переплетениях {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. Здесь обретаются их кабалы, отсюда начинаются рейды в реальный мир, в этих тенях таятся верховные предводители ксеносов. Сюда же друкари свозят свою добычу — как свезли и нас".

traits.locale_text: "Прискорбно мало, {name}. Комморра — город {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, огромный домен ксеносов, возведенный прямо в переплетениях {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. Здесь обретаются их кабалы, отсюда начинаются рейды в реальный мир, в этих тенях таятся верховные предводители ксеносов. Сюда же друкари свозят свою добычу — как свезли и нас".

languages.text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."
languages.original_text: "Прискорбно мало, {name}. Комморра — город {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, огромный домен ксеносов, возведенный прямо в переплетениях {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

languages.text: “很遗憾，我知之甚少，{name}。科摩罗是{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的城市，这种四处侵袭的异形生活在{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的核心区域。这里是他们所在的阴谋团的总部，也是他们袭击真实世界的出发地。黑暗灵族的最高统治者就生活在这个地方的阴影之中。他们会把所有的猎物都带到这里，所以我们也被带了过来。”
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我知之甚少，{name}。科摩罗是{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的城市，这种四处侵袭的异形生活在{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的核心区域。这里是他们所在的阴谋团的总部，也是他们袭击真实世界的出发地。黑暗灵族的最高统治者就生活在这个地方的阴影之中。他们会把所有的猎物都带到这里，所以我们也被带了过来。”

languages.original_text: "Regrettably little, . Commorragh is the city of the Drukhari, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the Webway. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

languages.text: «Muy poco, por desgracia, {name}. Commorragh es la ciudad de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, un extenso dominio xenos construido en el mismo plexo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. Este es el hogar de sus Kábalas y el lugar del que despegan sus incursiones al espacio real. Los líderes más supremos de los xenos acechan entre las sombras de este lugar. Y, por último, es donde los Drukhari guardan su botín, del que nosotros formamos parte».
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: «Muy poco, por desgracia, {name}. Commorragh es la ciudad de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, un extenso dominio xenos construido en el mismo plexo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. Este es el hogar de sus Kábalas y el lugar del que despegan sus incursiones al espacio real. Los líderes más supremos de los xenos acechan entre las sombras de este lugar. Y, por último, es donde los Drukhari guardan su botín, del que nosotros formamos parte».

languages.text: 「残念なことに、ごく僅かだ、{name}。コモラフは{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の都市であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}の叢に築かれた広大な異種族の居住区なんだ。ここは彼らの陰謀団の本拠地であり、リアルスペースへの襲撃の出発点でもある。異種族の最高指導者たちはこの場所の影に隠れている。そしてここは、デュカーリが獲物を持ち帰る場所…我々もそのようにして連れてこられたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: 「残念なことに、ごく僅かだ、{name}。コモラフは{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の都市であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}の叢に築かれた広大な異種族の居住区なんだ。ここは彼らの陰謀団の本拠地であり、リアルスペースへの襲撃の出発点でもある。異種族の最高指導者たちはこの場所の影に隠れている。そしてここは、デュカーリが獲物を持ち帰る場所…我々もそのようにして連れてこられたのだ」

languages.text: "Bedauerlich wenig, {name}. Commorragh ist die Stadt der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, das weitläufige Xenos-Reich, das mitten im Plexus des {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netzes der Tausend Tore{/g} errichtet wurde. Hier sind ihre Kabalen zu Hause, und von hier aus unternehmen sie ihre Angriffe auf den Realraum. Die obersten Anführer der Xenos hausen in den Schatten dieser Stadt. Und hierher bringen die Drukhari auch ihre Beute — wie uns."
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauerlich wenig, {name}. Commorragh ist die Stadt der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, das weitläufige Xenos-Reich, das mitten im Plexus des {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netzes der Tausend Tore{/g} errichtet wurde. Hier sind ihre Kabalen zu Hause, und von hier aus unternehmen sie ihre Angriffe auf den Realraum. Die obersten Anführer der Xenos hausen in den Schatten dieser Stadt. Und hierher bringen die Drukhari auch ihre Beute — wie uns."

languages.text: « Très peu de choses, malheureusement. Commorragh est la ville des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, un immense domaine xénos construit au cœur même de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. C'est le point de départ de tous leurs raids dans l'espace réel, ainsi que le siège de leurs Kabales et nul doute que leurs leaders se terrent aussi quelque part dans ce cloaque. C'est également ici que les Drukharis amènent leurs prisonniers... comme nous. »
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: « Très peu de choses, malheureusement. Commorragh est la ville des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, un immense domaine xénos construit au cœur même de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. C'est le point de départ de tous leurs raids dans l'espace réel, ainsi que le siège de leurs Kabales et nul doute que leurs leaders se terrent aussi quelque part dans ce cloaque. C'est également ici que les Drukharis amènent leurs prisonniers... comme nous. »

languages.text: "Korkarım çok az şey {name}. Commorragh, {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} şehridir. {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol'un{/g} tam göbeğine konmuş zeno mekânıdır. Kabalları burada oturur. Gerçekuzaya baskına buradan çıkarlar. Bu mekân, zenoların en büyük önderlerine evlik yapar. Drukhariler, avlarını buraya getirir... Aynı bizi getirdikleri gibi."
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, little, {name}. Commorragh is the city of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, the sprawling xenos domain built in the very plexus of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. This is the home of their Kabals, and the launch point for their raids into realspace. The xenos' most supreme leaders dwell within the shadows of this place. And this is where the Drukhari bring their bounty — as they have brought us."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım çok az şey {name}. Commorragh, {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} şehridir. {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g}'un tam göbeğine konmuş zeno mekânıdır. Kabalları burada oturur. Gerçekuzaya baskına buradan çıkarlar. Bu mekân, zenoların en büyük önderlerine ev sahipliği yapar. Drukhariler, avlarını buraya getirir... Bizi getirdikleri gibi."
